title: Edwardian Era Elegance
description: A period marked by luxurious fabrics, elaborate hats, and flowing gowns symbolizing social status and refinement.

title: The Flapper Revolution
description: Shorter hemlines, bobbed hair, and bold accessories challenged traditional norms and embraced freedom.

title: Utility and Wartime Fashion
description: Practical designs with a focus on durability during wartime, blending style with necessity.

title: Hollywood Glamour
description: The silver screen influenced fashion with sleek silhouettes, red lips, and elegant gowns.

title: Poiret and the Birth of Modernism
description: Paul Poiret's designs broke away from corsets, embracing flowing lines and bold colors.
imageURL: Poiret and the Birth of Modernism.jpg

title: Rise of Punk & Street Fashion
description: Rebellious styles with leather jackets, ripped jeans, and DIY fashion statements.
